name: Drivingo
description: Drivingo is an automated drive-thru service that uses Touch, Talk, and our proprietary Gesture-Based Ordering to help QSRs increase their TAM through accessible ordering.
one_liner: Drivingo is an automated drive-thru service that uses Touch, Talk, and our proprietary Gesture-Based Ordering to help QSRs increase their TAM through accessible ordering.
